meanings.definition: A class of plant hormones that promote cell division and growth.
meanings.sent1: The cytokinins in the plant helped it grow taller.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use cytokinins to make their crops grow faster.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous garden gnome sprinkled extra cytokinins on the flowers, causing them to grow wildly out of control.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement acted like cytokinins, spurring her team to work harder and achieve great success.
meanings.sent5: The cytokinins worked like magic, transforming the small seedling into a lush, thriving plant.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of plant growth substances that promote cell division and have other effects.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the effects of cytokinins on plant growth.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners use cytokinins to help their flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous garden gnome sprinkled extra cytokinins on the flowers, causing them to grow wildly out of control.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement acted like cytokinins, spurring her team to work harder and achieve great success.
meanings.sent5: The cytokinins worked like magic, transforming the small seedling into a lush, thriving plant.
